summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal street railway system owned and operated by the City of Seattle, declaring the estimated cost thereof as near as may be, and providing for the submission to the qualified voters of said city of such plan or system and the incurring of a general indebtedness therefor in lieu of certain general indebtedness heretofore authorized under Ordinance No. 26069.
